title: Learn to Cook Italian Pasta
description: Master the art of making fresh pasta from scratch! I'll teach you traditional techniques passed down from my Italian grandmother, including how to make perfect dough and classic sauces.

title: Guitar Lessons for Beginners
description: Learn acoustic guitar fundamentals - chords, strumming patterns, and your first songs. Perfect for complete beginners who want to start their musical journey.

title: Learn Spanish Conversation
description: Looking for someone to practice conversational Spanish with. I'm intermediate level and want to improve my fluency through regular practice sessions.

title: Beginner Yoga & Meditation
description: Gentle introduction to yoga poses and mindfulness meditation. Perfect for stress relief and building flexibility. All levels welcome!

title: JavaScript & Web Development
description: Teach modern web development using JavaScript, React, and CSS. Great for beginners wanting to build their first website or career switchers.
